lines.text: Hey, Jerkovski! Back again, eh? Where'd you beat off this time, study hall?
Smart thinking, Mel. No better place to beat the meat, huh?
Do you gentlemen know the meaning of the word vermin? Heathens? Scum? Trash? Degenerates?

[raising hand]
I think I know what trash means...
Gee, girls, thanks. My first strike!
